file_content.text: Soon, Wrath. He will return.
Wrath. This explains much.
Servant One.
You should not have destroyed the Opticrons.
The droids exist so that we may know you. You exist so that you may serve our master.
You have no need to know my every movement. The droids were an insult.
I don't like being spied on.
We determine our needs.
Why have you come to Rishi? Not because of the droids....
What are you doing here?
We will come to that.
The droids spoke of a ritual. They said that "when he returns, all stars will die."
They said troubling things.
The sayings of the Opticrons must be interpreted with care. That is our work, not yours.
You are an instrument of our master's will. Perhaps you have spent too much time serving among the fleets and the Dark Council.
First Ilum, then Makeb, and on the list goes... what does not threaten the Emperor is not your concern. We fear you forget this.
Your last instructions were to keep the Empire strong for the Emperor's return. Should I proceed differently?
What would you have me do?
Not yet--not so long as you remember your role. We are at a delicate juncture, and you must trust in us.
The events on those planets concerned the fate of the entire Empire. I will not ignore our enemies.
I was needed in those places.
We are at a delicate juncture. Your past choices are of mixed merit; trust that we will inform you when you are needed.
I've forgotten nothing. You need not be concerned.
I know my place, Hand.
Good. We are at a delicate juncture. Trust that if there are matters of import, you will be told.
Now, I understand Darth Vowrawn sought to meet you here. He has committed crimes against the Hand.
What sort of crimes?
He sought to learn our secrets and interrogated a Servant. We believe he is fleeing to the unmapped stars of the Rishi Maze.
Did he reach you? If he left this world only recently, we might still find him.
Vowrawn stood in that very spot. He could not be gone long--he can still be caught.
Yes, he was here.
Excellent. The Hand will see to it.
If he attempted to contact me, he failed. I felt a presence here and came to investigate.
[Lie] No, I haven't seen him.
Then our search must continue. He will not elude the Hand forever.
Vowrawn was the one to tell me of the droids. He must have known they belonged to the Hand.
He betrayed me. I'll kill him.
I will see to his death myself.
No. The chase may be long, and you shall be needed soon. Others will make certain he is punished.
We will not ask that you stay your saber and return to the tranquility of our fortress. Your edge must not be dulled.
Have faith that all questions, all concerns, will shortly be resolved. The Emperor is returning, and we will fuel his flame.
As always, I am the Emperor's loyal servant.
I will obey.
Then we chose well.
Your cryptic words mean nothing. How will he return? What does it mean to "fuel his flame"?
That doesn't sound pleasing.
Fear not. It will be glorious.
Be ready, mighty Wrath. Soon you will fulfill your true destiny.
I will not be patronized, and I am no one's slave. I am reconsidering our arrangement, Servant.
I grow tired of this. [Choke]
If your master desires my aid, he can speak to me himself.
You have made... a grievous error.
You are making a grievous error, Wrath.
No. The error was yours.
This was unexpected.
